title: Contact Us on doesn't call back and store.google.com/it/repair is always "out of office hours"
content:
I've sent several request following this indications,
but I didn't receive any answer.

Why is the "Talk with us" service doesn't call back?

I'm now trying to contact the assistance through 
this link, but it permanently shows:
"Phone support is currently closed. Please try again during business hours."

What are the office hours (what time zone)?

thank you for your help
Francesco
